ruleToc.chapterName:
<js>
var a=new String(result);
if(a.indexOf('/"')>=0){
   a = a.replace(/^.*>(.+?)<\/a>$/,"推荐阅读：$1");
}
else {
   a = a.replace(/^.*>(.+?)<\/a>$/,"$1");
}
a;
</js>
